text: Great that speech academy is at Beauty World! My boy enjoyed it at the Jurong branch previously but needed to switch over as he had art class at Muz as well. Thanks Teacher Genie and the team for being so nice to him.

Registered for the trial class for my son and he really enjoyed it. He speaks a lot but the program here will provide the best form of structure on improving his speech and communication. We received good tips and guidance on the syllabus from teacher genie
